name: Cat-ch
description: Welcome to Cat-ch, a group-led, story-based RPG for all. The game is set in a café run by none other than the players themselves. However, the general success of the cafe rests on the players' ability to “cat-ch” the mischievous cat who is causing several misfortunes to their humble establishment. From broken utensils to stretched-up curtains and possible food poisoning, this cat will have players on their toes coming up with solutions to fix various whacky occurrences. Through descriptive storytelling, chance dice rolls, cards and crazy scenarios, players will have to save their cafe by defeating the cat before it defeats them.
